categories: Category:Battles of the war against Zakuul

nodes.text: The Eternal Fleet reprisal bombardments were a series of bombardments carries out by the Eternal Fleet against five inhabited worlds in 3630 BBY. Following the Battle of Asylum Emperor Arcann of the Eternal Empire ordered the search for the Gravestone and The Commander that resulted in no leads. Trying to lure them out, he ordered High Justice Vaylin to use the Eternal Fleet against five different inhabitant planets in different sectors. The order was carries out and the worlds were bombed to dust, with whole cities leveled and civilian death toll counted in millions.
Eternal Fleet reprisal bombardments appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise.
